pr_title: Support overriding global routing status of routing policies

timeline.message: Remove support for legacy serialized format
Simplify test code using routing policies
Support overriding global endpoint status at deployment level
Support overriding global endpoint status at zone level
Support overriding global routing status through deployment.xml

timeline.bodyText: They should not happen - but consider ID collisions?
timeline.author: oyving

replies.bodyText: The data read here is the result of toSlime(Map<RoutingPolicyId, RoutingPolicy>), so collisions can only occur if toSlime somehow writes the same cluster+zone pair more than once or if an external entity messes with the ZK data. The former is covered by RoutingPolicySerializerTest.
replies.author: mpolden
